name: FindTable
description: 二次封装element-plus的Table，提供灵活的配置项
author: hjhclare

scripts.build:table: cross-env LIB_ENTRY=packages/table/src/index.ts LIB_NAME=Table LIB_OUTDIR=packages/table/dist LIB_EXTERNALS=@clare-ui/core vite build
scripts.build:upload: cross-env LIB_ENTRY=packages/upload/src/index.ts LIB_NAME=Upload LIB_OUTDIR=packages/upload/dist LIB_EXTERNALS= vite build
scripts.build:core: cross-env LIB_ENTRY=packages/core/src/index.ts LIB_NAME=Core LIB_OUTDIR=packages/core/dist LIB_EXTERNALS= vite build
scripts.build:nova: cross-env LIB_ENTRY=packages/nova-ui/src/index.ts LIB_NAME=NovaUI LIB_OUTDIR=packages/nova-ui/dist LIB_EXTERNALS=@clare-ui/table,@clare-ui/upload,@clare-ui/core vite build
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:core && pnpm run build:table && pnpm run build:upload && pnpm run build:nova
